doc:
Mel Smith https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mel_Smith 0 Melvin Kenneth Smith (3 December 1952 – 19 July 2013) was an English comedian, writer, film director, producer, and actor. Smith worked on the sketch comedy shows Not the Nine O'Clock News and Alas Smith and Jones with his comedy partner, Griff Rhys Jones. Smith and Jones founded Talkback, which grew to be one of the UK's largest producers of television comedy and light entertainment programming. Melvin_Kenneth_Smith ( 3_December_1952 – 19_July_2013 ) was an_English_comedian , writer , film_director , producer , and actor . Smith worked on the_sketch_comedy shows Not_the_Nine_O'Clock_News and Alas_Smith and Jones with his_comedy_partner , Griff_Rhys_Jones . Smith_and_Jones founded Talkback , which grew_to_be one of the_UK 's_largest_producers of television_comedy and light_entertainment_programming .
